name: customproperty
description: Creates, removes, or updates a custom property to the hunter's stats.

options.name: transaction
options.description: Whether to create, remove, or update the value of the property.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the property to edit.

options.name: hunter
options.description: Adding a tag for this command will perform it for that hunter. Default is the current userâ€™s Hunter.
